member.name: T:Enderlook.Mathematics.Geometry
member.summary: Utility methods used when working with geometry.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.Geometry.Centroid(System.Span{System.Numerics.Vector2})
member.summary: Calculate the centroid of a give span of points.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.Geometry.AreInCircle(System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Determines if 4 points forms a circle.

member.name: T:Enderlook.Mathematics.Orientation
member.summary: Determines the orientation of a set of points.

member.name: P:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.TrianglePointsCount
member.summary: Amount of triangles points. This is * 3.

member.name: P:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.TrianglePointsFlatten
member.summary: Indexes of triangles vertices. Each 3 elements represents a triangle.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.Centroid(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the centroid of a triangle.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.Circumcenter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the circumenter of a triangle.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.FromPoints(System.Memory{System.Numerics.Vector2},Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo@)
member.param: Result of the triangulation, if any.
member.returns: Whenever the triangulation was sucessful or not.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.EdgePointsFlatten
member.returns: Edge points flattened. Each 2 elements represent a halfedge.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.EdgePositionsFlatten
member.returns: Edge positions flattened. Each 2 elements represent a halfedge.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.PositionOfHull(System.Int32)
member.returns: Position of the specified point in the hull.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.EdgePositionsOfHull(System.Int32)
member.returns: Edge positions of a point in the hull.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.HullEdgePositions
member.returns: Edge positiions of all hull points.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.NextHalfedge(System.Int32)
member.returns: Next halfedge index of the specified halfedge.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.PreviousHalfedge(System.Int32)
member.returns: Previous halfedge index of the specified halfedge.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.EdgesOfTriangle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the halfedge points of a triangle.
member.returns: Halfedge points of the specified triangle.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.TriangleOfEdge(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the triangle index associated with a edge.
member.returns: Triangle index associated with the specified edge.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.TrianglesPositionsFlatten
member.returns: Triangle positions. Each 3 elements represent a triangle.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.TrianglesAdjacentToTriangle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get indexes of triangles adjacents to a triangle.
member.returns: Indexes of triangles adjacents to the specified triangle.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.PointsOfTriangle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the points of a triangle.
member.returns: Indexes of the points of the specified triangle.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.PositionsOfTriangle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the positions of a triangle vertices.
member.returns: Positions of the vertices of the specified triangle.

member.name: T:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.AdjacentTriangles
member.summary: Represent adjacents triangles to certain triangle.

member.name: P:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.AdjacentTriangles.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Access the adjacents triangles by index.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.AdjacentTriangles.CopyTo(System.Span{System.Int32})
member.summary: Copy the points of the adjacent triangles.

member.name: M:Enderlook.Mathematics.MeshInfo.VoronoiCellsFromCentroids
member.summary: Get all voronoi cells calculated using centroids.

member.summary: Get all voronoi cells calculated using circumcenters.

member.summary: Get all voronoi edges calculated using centroids.

member.summary: Get all voronoi edges calculated using centroids.
member.returns: Voronoi edges. Each 2 elements represent an edge.

member.summary: Get all voronoi edges calculated using circumcenters.

member.summary: Get all voronoi edges calculated using circumcenters.
member.returns: Voronoi edges. Each 2 elements represent an edge.
